pullRequest.title: [#3509] Fix address server mode cannot be obtained application.properties
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
see #3509
Brief changelog


Use ApplicationUtils.getProperty () get variable


Synchronize the parameters in properties


After the change, get the priority system environment variable of the variable, then start the JVM (- D) - > properties property

commit.message: Fix address server mode cannot be obtained application.properties And synchronize the properties value(#3509)
